projects.title: PlasmaJS
projects.description: Built an isomorphic NodeJS framework powered with React for building web apps. It has features like declarative syntax, isomorphic routing, isolated routing for building REST APIs, middlewares, ES2015 syntax with babel

projects.title: Diary PWA
projects.description: Build a progressive web app in go-lang that lets you carry a personalized secure diary in your pocket. Write down memories, keep your thoughts and ideas for the day in one place. You can also enable pattern lock for each session making your diary even more secure.

projects.title: Pattern Lock JS
projects.description: Built a customizable pattern lock JavaScript library for the web. It uses HTML5 canvas.

projects.title: Fuckinator 3000
projects.description: It"s a.... it can be used for..... nothing. It basically converts your sentence into a better sentence.

projects.title: H Kotlin
projects.description: Built a simple, easy to use, library for HTML templating in kotlin. It allows you to write re-usable components in Kotlin.

projects.title: Mr. Senti
projects.description: Build a demo for sentiment analysis in python. It uses Support Vector Machine to classify the provided string as "happy" or "sad"

projects.title: Nearby Delicacies
projects.description: Built a simple web app that uses the zomato api to search restaurants in a 1KM radius.

projects.title: Evil Bugs Game
projects.description: Built an arcade game(Evil Bugs[Brilliant name, right?]) with the objective of collecting stars and bringing them back to the grass area. Thats it, I think.... Oh, and the bugs are evil. So... avoid them.

projects.title: OxyRouter
projects.description: Built a javascript library that makes hash-based routing easy to use. It uses handlebars to render templates and has a very simple api.
